mapper.insert: insert into t_tenant_note_recharge (id, tenant_id, tenant_note_id, uid, recharge_num, recharge_time, create_time) values (#{id}, #{tenantId}, #{tenantNoteId}, #{uid}, #{rechargeNum}, #{rechargeTime}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id, tenant_id, tenant_note_id, uid, recharge_num, recharge_time, create_time FROM t_tenant_note_recharge where tenant_id = #{tenantId} order by create_time desc limit #{offset}, #{size}
